Transclusions demo <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <sect1 version="5.0" xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" xml:id="sec.parent"> <sect2 xml:id="sec.first"> <para>First section!</para> </sect2> <sect2 xml:id="sec.ond"> <para>Second section!</para> </sect2> </sect1>
Here it comes again: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <sect1 version="5.0" xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" xml:id="sec.parent"> <sect2 xml:id="sec.first"> <para>First section!</para> </sect2> <sect2 xml:id="sec.ond"> <para>Second section!</para> </sect2> </sect1> That was it.
